item.title: Android Bluetooth使用
item.description: Background 最近在做毕业设计的时候需要用到嵌入式设备（HC-06）和手机通信，然后我选择了蓝牙的方案。 方案 使用逻辑 为了支持不同的设备，需要设计一个绑定

item.title: Gait Analysis Project (Android app)
item.description: Background It is my degree individual engineering project in Northumbria University . Also, I would like to practice my ability of mobile development in Android. Overview The project is devided into Embedded part and Android app part. Embedded part Hardware: consisting of a development board NXP FRDM-KL25Z, a magnetometer and a bluetooth chip HC-06. Software: implementing function of ADC, I2C, LED-PWM, UART. Detecting imu and mag data and transmit the

item.title: Control of Mobile Robots
item.description: class info courcera Getech class link cource review not so difficult Notes Mobile Robots Decrete time: $$ x_{k+1}=f(x_k, u_k) $$ Continuous time: $$ \frac{dx}{dt}=\dot x =f(x, u) $$ c.s. : map continuous -> discrete Taylor approx: $$ x(k\delta t+\delta t)=x(k\delta t)+\delta t\cdot \dot{x}(k\delta t) $$ PID regulator $$ u(t) = K_pe(t)+K_i \int^t_0{e(\tau)d\tau}+ K_d\frac{de(t)}{dt} $$ P : contribute to stability, resp. medium rate I : tracking, resp. slow rate, may cause oscillation D: resp.

item.title: Some problems during configing url of hugo
item.description: Problem: 设定posts和tags目录时跳转不对，会出现类似于<website>/<website>/post之类的情况 Solution: 在config中设置post item的跳转地址为post，代表绝对路径，而不是/post，代表相对位置。 如果设置为/post，在主界面可以正常跳转，但在其他界面无法转到正常的页面。./post也同理。
